text:
e="preserve">Morten Lindberg (23 September 1965 – 26 March 2019), also known as "Master Fatman", was a Danish media personality, comedian, disc jockey, movie director, and singer. He was born in Munkebo, Funen. In 1992, Lindberg directed his first movie, the short movie "Gayniggers from Outer Space". In 2006, Master Fatman competed in the 3rd season of the popular contest "Vild Med Dans" on TV2.
Lindberg died on 26 March 2019, aged 53.
